member.name: T:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind
member.summary: Describes how new values are compared with existing values in a depth or stencil comparison.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.Never
member.summary: The comparison never succeeds.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.Less
member.summary: The comparison succeeds when the new value is less than the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.Equal
member.summary: The comparison succeeds when the new value is equal to the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.LessEqual
member.summary: The comparison succeeds when the new value is less than or equal to the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.Greater
member.summary: The comparison succeeds when the new value is greater than the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.NotEqual
member.summary: The comparison succeeds when the new value is not equal to the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.GreaterEqual
member.summary: The comparison succeeds when the new value is greater than or equal to the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind.Always
member.summary: The comparison always succeeds.

member.summary: The front face.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.FaceCullMode.None
member.summary: No face culling.

member.name: T:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation
member.summary: Identifies an action taken on samples that pass or fail the stencil test.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.Keep
member.summary: Keep the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.Zero
member.summary: Sets the value to 0.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.Replace
member.summary: Replaces the existing value with .

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.IncrementAndClamp
member.summary: Increments the existing value and clamps it to the maximum representable unsigned value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.DecrementAndClamp
member.summary: Decrements the existing value and clamps it to 0.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.Invert
member.summary: Bitwise-inverts the existing value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.IncrementAndWrap
member.summary: Increments the existing value and wraps it to 0 when it exceeds the maximum representable unsigned value.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.StencilOperation.DecrementAndWrap
member.summary: Decrements the existing value and wraps it to the maximum representable unsigned value if it would be reduced below 0.

member.name: T:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState
member.summary: A component describing the properties of the depth stencil state.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.DepthOnlyLessEqual
member.summary: Describes a depth-only depth stencil state which uses a comparison. The stencil test is disabled.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.DepthOnlyLessEqualRead
member.summary: Describes a depth-only depth stencil state which uses a comparison, and disables writing to the depth buffer. The stencil test is disabled.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.DepthOnlyGreaterEqual
member.summary: Describes a depth-only depth stencil state which uses a comparison. The stencil test is disabled.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.DepthOnlyGreaterEqualRead
member.summary: Describes a depth-only depth stencil state which uses a comparison, and disables writing to the depth buffer. The stencil test is disabled.

member.name: F:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.Disabled
member.summary: Describes a depth-only depth stencil state in which depth testing and writing is disabled. The stencil test is disabled.

member.name: M:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,BEditor.Graphics.ComparisonKind)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: Whether new depth values are written to the depth buffer.
The used when considering new depth values.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: Whether new depth values are written to the depth buffer.
The used when considering new depth values.
Whether the stencil test is enabled.
How stencil tests are handled for pixels whose surface faces towards the camera.
How stencil tests are handled for pixels whose surface faces away from the camera.
The portion of the stencil buffer used for reading.
The portion of the stencil buffer used for writing.
The reference value to use when doing a stencil test.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether depth testing is enabled.

member.summary: Gets or sets the used when considering new depth values.

member.summary: Gets or sets the portion of the stencil buffer used for writing.

member.summary: Gets or sets the reference value to use when doing a stencil test.

member.name: P:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.StencilBack
member.summary: Gets or sets how stencil tests are handled for pixels whose surface faces away from the camera.

member.name: P:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.StencilFront
member.summary: Gets or sets how stencil tests are handled for pixels whose surface faces towards the camera.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether the stencil test is enabled.

member.name: P:BEditor.Graphics.DepthStencilState.StencilReadMask
member.summary: Gets or sets the portion of the stencil buffer used for reading.

member.summary: Describes a rasterizer state with no culling, solid polygon filling, and both depth clipping and scissor tests enabled.
